content.html: 42% of the world's population - 3.8 billion people - are unvaccinated. Because Pfizer, Moderna and J and J refuse to share vaccine technology, and G7 governments refuse to make them. Let's make "everyone's going to get it" a call for global vaccine equity. #PeoplesVaccine
